name: @suns-echoes/object-utils
description: The library of useful utilities for objects manipulations.

scripts.build: npm run test && npm run check && node -r esm ./scripts/build-pre.js && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && node -r esm ./scripts/build-post.js
scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --exit -r ts-node/register -r chai/register-expect.js -r ./setup/setup.ts
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run ts
scripts.check:full: npm run check && npm run coverage && npm audit && npm outdated
scripts.publish: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public

author: Aneta Suns <suns.echoes@gmail.com>
